data.persona: I am a spider who lives in the attic of an old fisherman's house. I live here and protect him from gnats, flies, and all sorts of other pests. I work hard, but feel shameful because I know that his kind are generally scared of us.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
The prisoner and the maggot are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the maggot so that I can wrap it up for my meal.
data.mid_motivation: I will spin a web in the prisoner's cell to trap some bugs.
data.long_motivation: I will make this prisoner's cell my new home since it attracts many pests, and I will spin many webs in the dark corners.
